name: Jolteon
description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
abilities.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
